person.persName: Abram H. Hardin (Oldham County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Oldham County, Kentucky, farmer. Oldham County, Kentucky, native. Son of Jonathan Hardin and Lucy Hardin. Married to Louisa F. Yager Hardin in Oldham County, Kentucky, in 1854. Father of Roger H. Hardin, Claudius Clay Hardin, Rose A. Hardin, and Lee Hardin. Farmer in Oldham County in 1850. Household owned five enslaved persons in Oldham County in 1850. Farmer in Oldham County in 1860. Household owned eight enslaved persons in Oldham County in 1860.
